name: Environaut\Export\Formatter\ConsoleMessageFormatter
short_desc: Simple formatter that takes messages from the results of the given report and enhances them according to their severity etc.

format.name: format
format.short_desc: This method takes the given report and then does something with it.
format.long_desc:
This may include
writing the settings and messages to different files or send them somewhere.

It may return strings that will be output to the console afterwards. The return
messages may be formatted with tags understood by the Symfony Console Component.
format.hint_desc: messages formatted with the configured format

report.name: report
report.short_desc: report to take results (and messages) from

DEFAULT_FORMAT.name: DEFAULT_FORMAT
DEFAULT_FORMAT.short_desc: Default sprintf compatible format for messages.
